A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
*SPOILERS*

THE GOOD : COOL ACTION SCENES\, CGI\, DIRECTION\, ACTING.

THE BAD : NO CHARACTER ARC FOR POE & FINN. LOUSY NEW CHARACTER "ROSE". NO ACTUAL JEDI TRAINING FOR "REY". EARLY SEND OFF OF "SNOKE". CAPT. PHASMA A PROP. LAURA DERN WASTED AS HOLDO. ITS OK TO DEFY EXPECTATIONS OF FANS IN "REY's Lineage"\, "Leia's jedi powers" & "Luke's Astral Stand Up" but it fails to do justice to any of it.

THE WORST : OK HERE WE GO. Worst "STAR WARS" plot ever. THEY RUN OUT OF GAS ? WTH ? Poe wasted. Finn & Rose are in another movie altogether. That 20 - 25 min Casino scene could have been used for "REY-LUKE" scene. JJ gave emotional send off to HAN in TFA\, but here LUKE "THE HERO OF ORIGINAL HOLY TRINITY\, THE SKYWALKER\, THE JEDI MASTER" is killed off just after 2 mins of standing. Not Fans but EVERYONE was hoping for one last epic stand up of "LUKE against NEW ORDER" saving the resistance but it was a let down of galactic proportions. Glaring plot holes. Ending was a bummer unlike TFA.

Summary : Neither it expands the characters\, ideas\, mysteries from THE FORCE AWAKENS nor it brings anything new to table. It fails miserably to do justice to HOLY TRINITY.
